name: Deluxe King Room
description: A spacious room with a king-sized bed, perfect for couples or solo travelers seeking comfort. The room is elegantly furnished and comes with a view of the city.

name: Executive Suite
description: Experience luxury in our executive suite, featuring a separate living area and premium amenities. The suite offers a panoramic view of the nearby hills.

name: Family Room
description: Ideal for families, this room offers two queen beds and ample space for everyone to relax. It includes a play area for children and a balcony.
